projectPurpose: To automate the execution of 'sandwich attacks' in decentralized finance (DeFi) trading.
mainFeatures: Automated detection of sandwich opportunities in DeFi
Automated execution of buy and sell orders around large transactions
Designed for low-latency and high-frequency trading (inferred from purpose and language)

alternatives.name: Superalgos
mainFeatures: Strategy design and testing (backtesting, paper trading)

alternatives.name: MetaTrader 5
mainFeatures: Multi-asset trading (Forex, stocks, CFDs, futures, crypto via CFDs)

alternatives.name: TradingView
mainFeatures: Pine Script for custom indicators and strategies

marketPositioning: sandooo is a highly specialized, open-source tool positioned within the niche area of DeFi algorithmic trading, specifically focused on executing 'sandwich attacks'. Unlike broader trading bots that offer a variety of strategies across different markets, sandooo targets a specific Maximal Extractable Value (MEV) opportunity on decentralized exchanges. Its development in Rust suggests a focus on performance critical for competitive MEV strategies, distinguishing it from general-purpose platforms or bots which may not offer the low-level control and speed required for this specific use case. Its market position is as a tool for advanced users looking to engage in or understand the mechanics of DeFi sandwich trading.
